results.title: Identification of prophylactic drugs for oxaliplatin-induced peripheral neuropathy using big data.
results.text_hl: Retrospective medical chart review included clinical data from Tokushima University Hospital from April 2009 to March 2018. RESULTS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, indicated for @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@, significantly reduced the severity of @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@peripheral neuropathy@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Oxaliplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077150 @@@oxaliplatin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Hyperalgesia @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@hyperalgesia@@@.

citations.NLM: Zamami Y, Niimura T, Kawashiri T, Goda M, Naito Y, Fukushima K, Ushio S, Aizawa F, Hamano H, Okada N, Yagi K, Miyata K, Takechi K, Chuma M, Koyama T, Kobayashi D, Shimazoe T, Fujino H, Izawa-Ishizawa Y, Ishizawa K. results.title: Statins ameliorate oxaliplatin- and paclitaxel-induced peripheral neuropathy via glutathione-S-transferase.
results.text_hl: We investigated the novel effects of statins on chemotherapy-induced @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@peripheral neuropathy@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Peripheral neuropathy and lipid-lowering therapy.
results.text_hl: We report a case of a @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@peripheral neuropathy@@@ induced and exacerbated by several commonly used HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors including @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, and the vitamin @CHEMICAL_Niacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009525 @@@niacin@@@.

citations.NLM: Ziajka PE, Wehmeier T. Peripheral neuropathy and lipid-lowering therapy. South Med J. 1998 Jul;91(7):667-8. PMID: 9671841

results.title: Statins an oft-prescribed drug is implicated in peripheral neuropathy: The time to know more.
results.text_hl: Long-term statins therapy, mainly with @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, is linked with thedevelopment of @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@peripheral neuropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Al-Kuraishy HM, Al-Gareeb AI, Hussien NR, Al-Naimi MS, Rasheed HA. Statins an oft-prescribed drug is implicated in peripheral neuropathy: The time to know more. J Pak Med Assoc. 2019 Aug;69(Suppl 3)(8):S108-S112. PMID: 31603889

results.text_hl: ...UNLABELLED: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ is a hypocholesterolemic agent presumed to cause @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@peripheral neuropathy@@@.

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on sensorial, motor, and morphological parameters in sciatic nerve crush induced-neuropathic pain in rats.
results.text_hl: The present study compares the effects of a low and high doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in a model of @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@peripheral neuropathy@@@ by evaluating sensorial, motor, and morphological parameters.
